projects.title: DEX Exchange Dapp
projects.description: *I am currently working on the project.* Building a dex similar to UNISWAP with the use of Moralis to get current pricing. Morlis integrates with chainlink to provide off chain price data. The project will include a way to transfer any token in addition to charts were users can see the price of a token over time.

Implenting GEO-IP based blocking, bot protection, and DDos monitoring system

experience.title: Network Administrator
experience.description: At American Heritage Capital, I was tasked with Re-deploying a new high availability network that supports 70+ employees in Dallas and an offshore office.
responsibilities: Creating different subnets for different traffic like DMZ
Deploying RDP gateways for remote connection for all employees
Outbound Wan Failover, high availibity through HA link and CARP
Other features such as Snort for IPS/IDS, Squid for proxy, OpenVPN for VPN access, and GEO IP based blocking
Maintaining network and providing support to developers and loan production employees for the following years
